name: Combo
short_description: Combobox list field, allows free text.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: message
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties5.name: class
properties5.description: (optional) specify your own classes for additonal markup, defaults to "combobox".

properties7.name: required
properties7.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties8.name: validate
properties8.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties9.name: option
properties9.description: (mandatory) set the options of this radio. Separate options with commas and use the pipe symbol to separate value from text.

properties10.name: default
properties10.description: (optional) is the default list item value.

properties11.name: showon
properties11.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: A field type that combines a standard text input with a dropdown list of predefined options. Users can either type a custom value or choose from the available selections, offering flexibility in data entry.
